Html:
Hi,

I want to change the label and ticks when I zoomIn to a certain level. And change back when I make the zoom out.

I already made this with restrictions but it have some drawbacks.

Thanks

Hi Rafael,

Sorry, but I don't understand what do you want. Can you please give some more explanations, or post a screenshot, or post a repro.

Best regards,

Mikhail.

I have a GenericLocationalLabelProvider and GenericLocationalTicksProvider with Units as labels, when I zoomIn I want to show my sub-units.

Like the dateTimeAxis, when I zoomIn it changes from day to hour for example.

But I dont have several LabelProviders like in DateTime. There is a way to do this?
